## Endless Opportunities for Discovery

With a major for every interest and faculty ready to inspire your thinking,
the University of Minnesota Twin Cities is your opportunity to move beyond
what you know. And to discover what you don’t.

Academics and Admissions  Student Life

Undergraduate Graduate Hybrid or Online

“I chose the U of M because it had the perfect mix of big-city living and
small-town life. I got to move from a small town to a big city and still be
within driving distance of home.”

Braydon Mallett '21

Biology

##  Meet Our #UMNproud Community

At #UMN, we celebrate success—from the everyday to the extraordinary. Here,
you’ll discover your people, begin new adventures, explore fascinating ideas,
and find your inspiration. Follow us on Instagram to see what it means to be
#UMNproud.

Powered by Curator.io

Dec 1, 2023

Now on view, with a Public Program & Reception this Friday:  
  
The Ties Between  
BA Capstone Exhibition  
Nov 28 – December 9  
Regis West Gallery  
Public Program & Reception: Friday, December 1, 6 — 8:30 PM  
Program | 6:00 – 6:30 PM | InFlux Auditorium, E110  
Reception | 6:30 – 8:30 PM | Regis West Gallery  
  
The Department of Art is pleased to present The Ties Between, an exhibition
featuring works by 14 artists who are about to complete their Bachelor of Arts
(BA) degrees in Studio Art at the University of Minnesota. The exhibition
explores themes of connection, memory, and intimacy through a wide range of
media including ceramics, video, painting, photography, mixed media, and
digital art. This group of artists supported one another to create an
exhibition that is rich in sensorial experience and brings together unique
perspectives in conversation with one another.  
  
Artists in the exhibition include Atziri Amador-Torres, Quang Au, Erin
Brockmeier, Hyunyoung Russ Cho, Aaron Finnell, Jamie Hessian, Étienne
Magdalen, Noura Miller, Ephrem Nguyen, Thao Nguyen, Amanda Robinson, Alyssa
Schmidt, Ava Tow, and Andy Xiong.  
  
That and more in this week's Art News + Happenings, out now at the link in our
bio!  
  
umncla umn_nash  
#UMNProud #umnart

##  News

News Release

###  Rebecca Cunningham selected as next president of the University of
Minnesota

The University of Minnesota Board of Regents selected Dr. Rebecca Cunningham
as the 18th President of the University of Minnesota System at a special
meeting today.

Feature

###  Where It Starts

Lives and identities are shaped by decades and centuries. They can be forever
altered in minutes or seconds. For the individuals and communities who
continue to make Black history at the University of Minnesota and beyond,
change starts wherever the powers of creativity, vision, and joy meet.

Feature

###  Resilient patient, resourceful surgeon

A very young boy gets the gift of a lifetime from a U of M hand surgeon.
